name: D.R.I.E.D
description:
You are a lone robot in the remnants of a ruined city. The world is a dusty wasteland. Little water can be found, and more importantly, fuel reserves are low. Make your way across the barren cityscape before your fuel dries up.

Programming : Jason Davey (@StrayBasilisk)

Sound : Efilheim (Bandcamp)

Art : Jack Pressnell (SomeFarang)
